capabilities.name: list-federation-links
capabilities.description: List all federation links in the RabbitMQ cluster.

capabilities.name: list-federation-links-vhost
capabilities.description: List all federation links for a given vhost.

capabilities.name: list-auth-attempts-node
capabilities.description: List all authentication attempts for a node.

capabilities.name: list-auth-attempts-node-source
capabilities.description: List all authentication attempts for a node/source.

capabilities.name: hash-password
capabilities.description: Hash a password using RabbitMQ's internal hashing.

capabilities.name: get-auth-info
capabilities.description: Get authentication info for the current user.

capabilities.name: list-bindings
capabilities.description: List all bindings in the RabbitMQ cluster.

capabilities.name: list-bindings-vhost
capabilities.description: List all bindings for a specific vhost.

capabilities.name: list-bindings-exchange-queue
capabilities.description: List bindings between an exchange and a queue.

capabilities.name: create-binding-exchange-queue
capabilities.description: Create a binding from an exchange to a queue.

capabilities.name: delete-binding-exchange-queue
capabilities.description: Delete a binding from an exchange to a queue.

capabilities.name: list-bindings-exchange-exchange
capabilities.description: List bindings between two exchanges.

capabilities.name: create-binding-exchange-exchange
capabilities.description: Create a binding from one exchange to another.

capabilities.name: delete-binding-exchange-exchange
capabilities.description: Delete a binding from one exchange to another.

capabilities.name: list-channels
capabilities.description: List all channels in the RabbitMQ cluster.

capabilities.name: get-channel
capabilities.description: Get details for a specific channel.

capabilities.name: list-channels-connection
capabilities.description: List all channels for a given connection.

capabilities.name: list-connections
capabilities.description: List all open connections.

capabilities.name: get-connection
capabilities.description: Get details for a specific connection.

capabilities.name: delete-connection
capabilities.description: Close a specific connection.

capabilities.name: list-connections-vhost
capabilities.description: List all open connections in a specific virtual host.

capabilities.name: list-connections-username
capabilities.description: List all open connections for a specific username.

capabilities.name: delete-connections-username
capabilities.description: Close all connections for a specific username. Optionally provide a reason.

capabilities.name: get-connection-channels
capabilities.description: List all channels for a given connection.

capabilities.name: list-consumers
capabilities.description: List all consumers in the RabbitMQ cluster.

capabilities.name: list-consumers-vhost
capabilities.description: List all consumers for a specific vhost.

capabilities.name: list-consumers-queue
capabilities.description: List all consumers for a specific queue.

capabilities.name: list-exchanges
capabilities.description: List all exchanges in the RabbitMQ cluster.

capabilities.name: list-exchanges-vhost
capabilities.description: List all exchanges for a specific vhost.

capabilities.name: get-exchange
capabilities.description: Get details for a specific exchange.

capabilities.name: put-exchange
capabilities.description: Create or update an exchange.

capabilities.name: delete-exchange
capabilities.description: Delete an exchange.

capabilities.name: get-exchange-bindings-source
capabilities.description: List bindings from an exchange (source).

capabilities.name: get-exchange-bindings-destination
capabilities.description: List bindings to an exchange (destination).

capabilities.name: get-health-alarms
capabilities.description: Get health check status for alarms.

capabilities.name: get-health-local-alarms
capabilities.description: Get health check status for local alarms.

capabilities.name: get-health-certificate-expiration
capabilities.description: Get health check status for certificate expiration within a given time.

capabilities.name: get-health-port-listener
capabilities.description: Get health check status for a port listener.

capabilities.name: get-health-protocol-listener
capabilities.description: Get health check status for a protocol listener.

capabilities.name: get-health-virtual-hosts
capabilities.description: Get health check status for all virtual hosts.

capabilities.name: get-health-node-is-quorum-critical
capabilities.description: Get health check status for node quorum criticality.

capabilities.name: get-rebalance-queues
capabilities.description: Get rebalance status for queues.

capabilities.name: get-whoami
capabilities.description: Get information about the current user.

capabilities.name: get-auth
capabilities.description: Get authentication status for the current user.

capabilities.name: get-extensions
capabilities.description: Get information about enabled RabbitMQ extensions.

capabilities.name: list-nodes
capabilities.description: List all nodes in the RabbitMQ cluster with their metrics

capabilities.name: get-node
capabilities.description: Get metrics of an individual cluster node

capabilities.name: get-node-memory
capabilities.description: Get memory usage breakdown of a specific cluster node
